title: Labour's tortured wrangling over Brexit cannot continue much longer
text:
Soon, the party will be forced to choose whether it wants to fight an election – or actually win one

Does Labour want a general election? Following "does Labour want a second referendum?" and, before that, "does Labour want Brexit?" that is the latest question dividing Her Majesty’s Opposition. With Jeremy Corbyn apparently shrinking his inner circle until it comprises a lone fellow traveller in the form of adviser Seumas Milne, the Leader is at odds with John McDonnell, his ally through the wilderness years, over both the date and shape of the election to come.

The trigger for the schism is Brexit; since the summer the Shadow Chancellor has seemed more bullish about batting for Remain than...
description: Soon, the party will be forced to choose whether it wants to fight an election – or actually win one
